meanings.definition: A product or substance used to enhance or alter the appearance of the face or body.
meanings.sent1: She applied a cosmetic to her cheeks before going out.
meanings.sent2: The store had a wide variety of cosmetics for sale.
meanings.sent3: The cosmetic made her look like a glamorous movie star.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a cosmetic, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The cosmetic transformed her appearance completely.

meanings.definition: Relating to the use of cosmetics.
meanings.sent1: She bought a cosmetic bag to store all her makeup.
meanings.sent2: The cosmetic industry is always evolving with new trends.
meanings.sent3: His cosmetic skills were put to the test for the theater production.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in a cosmetic array of colors.
meanings.sent5: The room had a cosmetic mirror that magnified every detail.

meanings.definition: Superficial or concerned only with surface appearance.
meanings.sent1: Her interest in fashion was purely cosmetic.
meanings.sent2: The changes were merely cosmetic and did not address the real issue.
meanings.sent3: The cosmetic changes to the building were met with mixed reactions.
meanings.sent4: His smile was cosmetic, hiding the pain he felt inside.
meanings.sent5: The cosmetic improvements to the park made it more inviting.
